Faq.title: How to contact with Customer Service?
Faq.description: Our Customer Experience Team is available 7 days a week and we offer 2 ways to get in contact.Email and Chat . We try to reply quickly, so you need not to wait too long for a response!.

Faq.title: App installation failed, how to update system information?
Faq.description: Please read the documentation carefully . We also have some online  video tutorials regarding this issue . If the problem remains, Please Open a ticket in the support forum .

Faq.title: Website reponse taking time, how to improve?
Faq.description: At first, Please check your internet connection . We also have some online  video tutorials regarding this issue . If the problem remains, Please Open a ticket in the support forum .

Faq.title: New update fixed all bug and issues?
Faq.description: We are giving the update of this theme continuously . You will receive an email Notification when we push an update. Always try to be updated with us .

Faq.title: New update fixed all bug and issues?
Faq.description: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.

Features.title: Powerful Features
Features.description: Automate time consuming tasks like organising expenses ,tracking your time and following up with clients

Features.title: Easy Invoicing
Features.description: Want to surprice your clients with professional looking invoices ? Then you are some clicks behind .

Features.title: Easy To Use
Features.description: Very Simple and intuitive. So you have to spend less time in paperwork and impress your customer with looks

Service.title: Auto Book Loads
Service.description: Auto Book loads based on the set filters.

Service.title: Price increase detection
Service.description: Automatically detect price hikes for the loads.

Service.title: Auto book on Price increase
Service.description: Auto book loads when there is a price increase.

Service.title: 1-Click book
Service.description: 1-Click book saves you extra click needed to book the load.

Service.title: Auto Refresh
Service.description: Configurable auto refresh let's you focus on loads rather than clicks.

Service.title: Sound notification
Service.description: Sound notification when load is booked or new load appears on the board.

Timeline.title: Wireframing for project
Timeline.description: We respect our customer opinions and deals with them with perfect wireframing.

Timeline.title: UI/UX for project
Timeline.description: We provide the best UI/UX Design by following the latest trends of the market .

Timeline.title: Negotiation about project
Timeline.description: After the negotiation is done , We start to build the project with latest technology .

Testimonial.name: Jon Doe
Testimonial.comment: Love to work with this designer in every our future project to ensure we are going to build best prototyping features.

Testimonial.name: Roman Ul Oman
Testimonial.comment: Impressed with master class support of the team and really look forward for the future. A true passionate team.
